articles.title: U.S. and EU agree to trade deal framework
articles.description: The United States and the European Union have reached a framework for a trade deal, which includes a 15 percent tariff on European goods. This agreement was announced on July 27, 2025.

articles.title: Two Israeli rights groups say their country is committing genocide in Gaza
articles.description: Two prominent Israeli human rights organizations have stated that Israel is committing genocide in Gaza. These groups are internationally respected but are considered on the political fringe within Israel.

articles.title: Passengers evacuate smoking jet at Denver airport after apparent landing gear problem
articles.description: Passengers were forced to evacuate a smoking American Airlines jet at Denver airport on July 27, 2025, due to an apparent landing gear issue.
